name: Zone 24x7 Inc.
description: Headquartered in San Jose, California, Zone24x7 Inc is a digital transformation partner to a wide range of organizations from technology startups to Fortune 500 organizations.
points: Worked as a full-stack developer in internal project related to code quality with Kotlin, Spring Boot and Angular.
Completed a database syncing application with LDAP integration written in Java, Quartz and MySQL.
Completed a proxy server application for routing requests from IoT devices to multiple endpoints with different transformations.
Worked as a frontend developer in Warehouse Management System with the React, Ant Design and dva.js.

name: Fiverr Inc.
description: Fiverr is an online marketplace for freelance services. The company provides a platform for freelancers to offer services to customers worldwide.
points: Worked as a Graphic Designer in logo designing, flyer designing category.
Worked as a Blogger Templated Developer for 3 years and promoted as a level 2 seller.
Best selling blogger related gig on Fiverr during the time period.
